Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

rulings.text: Brineborn Cutthroat must be on the battlefield for its last ability to function. Notably, the ability won't trigger as you cast Brineborn Cutthroat during an opponent's turn.
Brineborn Cutthroat's ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

mainBoard.name: Warden of Evos Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: A creature spell that doesn't have flying won't cost less even if an effect will cause the creature to have flying once on the battlefield. This is also true if the creature spell itself has an ability that gives it flying once on the battlefield under certain conditions, even if those conditions are true.
The last ability of Warden of Evos Isle can't reduce the colored mana requirement of a creature spell with flying.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

mainBoard.name: Dungeon Geists
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

rulings.text: The ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

Dungeon Geists’s triggered ability can target a tapped creature. If the targeted creature is already tapped when it resolves, that creature just remains tapped and won’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
If Dungeon Geists leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability has resolved, the target creature will be tapped, but it will be able to untap as normal.
If another player gains control of Dungeon Geists, its effect expires. It won’t keep the creature from untapping anymore, even if you later regain control of Dungeon Geists.

mainBoard.name: Mass Manipulation

rulings.text: In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well, and any effects that give the player control of permanents immediately end.
The control-change effect of Mass Manipulation lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step.

foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Unita, la natura leva la sua voce per dirvi: 'No'."
foreignData.name: Negare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「自然がね、あなたに向かって口をそろえて言うのよ。『だめだ。』ってね。」
foreignData.name: 否認
foreignData.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: "자연이 한 마음으로 네게 이 말을 전한다: '안돼.'"
foreignData.name: 부인
foreignData.text: 생물 주문이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Em uníssono, a natureza ergue a voz para lhes dizer: 'Não'."
foreignData.name: Negar
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura.

foreignData.flavorText: «Вся природа поднимается, чтобы в унисон сказать вам: "Нет"».
foreignData.name: Отвергнуть
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, не являющееся заклинанием существа.

foreignData.flavorText: "La naturaleza entera alza la voz para decirte con sus muchas bocas: 'No'".
foreignData.name: Negar
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura.

mainBoard.name: Negate

rulings.text: A "creature spell" is any spell with the creature type, even if it has other types such as artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Here, there is only truth."
—Barvisa, Azorius emissary

foreignData.flavorText:
「进去，里面只有真相。」
～俄佐立密使巴维莎
foreignData.name: 真相束环
foreignData.text:
每当一个由对手操控的生物成为横置时，若它并非于将其宣告为攻击者时而如此，则你可以抓一张牌。
{4}{U}：横置目标不具飞行异能的生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
「進去，裡面只有真相。」
～俄佐立密使巴維莎
foreignData.name: 真相束環
foreignData.text:
每當一個由對手操控的生物成為橫置時，若它並非於將其宣告為攻擊者時而如此，則你可以抽一張牌。
{4}{U}：橫置目標不具飛行異能的生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
« Ici, il n'y a que la vérité. »
—Barvisa, émissaire d'Azorius
foreignData.name: Cercle de vérité
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'une créature qu'un adversaire contrôle devient engagée, si elle n'est pas déclarée comme attaquante, vous pouvez piocher une carte.
{4}{U} : Engagez la créature sans le vol ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Hier gibt es nur eine Wahrheit."
—Barvisa, Azorius-Abgesandte
foreignData.name: Kreis der Wahrheit
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, getappt wird und falls das nicht passiert, sowie sie als Angreifer deklariert wird, kannst du eine Karte ziehen.
{4}{U}: Tappe eine nichtfliegende Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Qui non esiste altro che la verità."
—Barvisa, emissaria Azorius
foreignData.name: Circolo della Veridicità
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta una creatura controllata da un avversario viene TAPpata, se ciò non avviene per farla attaccare, puoi pescare una carta.
{4}{U}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio senza volare.

foreignData.flavorText:
「さあ、ここにあるのは真実だけです。」
――アゾリウスの使者、バービサー
foreignData.name: 真理の円
foreignData.text:
対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャーが１体タップ状態になるたび、それが攻撃クリーチャーとして指定されたことによるのではない場合、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。
{4}{U}：飛行を持たないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。

foreignData.flavorText:
"이곳에는 오직 진실만이 있다."
—아조리우스 사절, 바르비사
foreignData.name: 진실의 원
foreignData.text:
상대가 조종하는 생물이 탭될 때마다, 그 생물이 공격자로 선언되는 것이 아니라면, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다.
{4}{U}: 비행이 없는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Aqui há apenas a verdade."
— Barvisa, emissária Azorius
foreignData.name: Círculo da Veracidade
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que uma criatura que um oponente controla for virada, se ela não estiver sendo declarada como atacante, você poderá comprar um card.
{4}{U}: Vire a criatura alvo sem voar.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Здесь есть одна лишь только истина».
— Барвиса, эмиссар Азориусов
foreignData.name: Круг Истины
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз, когда существо под контролем оппонента становится повернутым, если оно не объявляется атакующим, то вы можете взять карту.
{4}{U}: поверните целевое существо без Полета.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Aquí solo tiene cabida la verdad".
—Barvisa, emisaria azoria
foreignData.name: Círculo de veracidad
foreignData.text:
Siempre que una criatura que controla un oponente se gire, si no es por estar siendo declarada como atacante, puedes robar una carta.
{4}{U}: Gira la criatura objetivo sin la habilidad de volar.

mainBoard.name: Verity Circle
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

rulings.text: For Verity Circle's first ability to trigger, the creature has to actually change from untapped to tapped. If an effect attempts to tap a tapped creature, but it was already tapped at the time, the ability won't trigger.
If a creature enters the battlefield tapped, Verity Circle's first ability doesn't trigger.
If a creature with vigilance is declared as an attacker and then becomes tapped while it's attacking, Verity Circle's first ability triggers.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
